content: a delicate botanical-inspired lace block featuring fern eyelets **pattern includes ** * full knitting chart * row-by-row written instructions this pattern was released as part of the **lace into spring mkal** 1 it is designed to be **compatible with all blocks** in the series this block is designed to be compatible with other squares in the lace into spring series you can purchase this pattern individually or as part of the full ebook collection you re welcome to join our ravelry group 2 to chat and share your progress 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lace-into-spring-mkal-2026 2 https //www ravelry com/groups/oh-la-lanas-kals
